Title: Show Me the Money
Plot: Sifuentes orders Roly to go undercover to nab a top cocaine and heroin dealer ? a dangerous assignment because the suspect?s most recent crime involved shooting an officer. As they work the case, a car involved in the investigation yields illegal drugs and weapons, but the team suspects the car is hiding an even bigger payoff.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
